alert.note: Alert for Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued May 23 at 9:34PM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...High Surf Advisory remains in effect... * SURF...Surf heights of 10 to 12 feet tonight will build to 11 to 14 feet on Tuesday. Highest surf will be on south and east facing shores. * TIMING...through Saturday * IMPACTS...Large surfs and strong rip currents. Fautuaga mo galu maualuluga Ofisa o le tau Pago Pago AS 934 PO ASO GAFUA ME 23 2022 ...O loo faaauau Fautuaga mo Galu maualuluga... * GALU...O galu maualuluga e 10 i le 12 futu i le po nanei o le a siisii atu i le 11 i le 14 futu i le Aso Lua. O galu matua maualuluga e aafia atu ai talafatai i saute ma sasae o le atunuu. * TAIMI...seia oo i le Aso Toona`i * AAFIAGA...E maualuluga galu ma e malosi le aave o le sami. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... O fautuaga mo galu maualuluga e faailoa mai ai le malolosi ma le tetele o galu o le a aafia ai gataifale ma matafaga, ma o le a malolosi aave o le sami e ono solo ai nisi o vaega o le matafaga. Ona o le siisii o peau o le sami, e fautuaina ai le mamalu lautele ma le au fai faiva ina ia faautagia mai lenei fautuaga ona o le maualuluga o galu ua iai nei.
info.instruction: A high surf advisory indicates large breaking waves will affect beaches in the advisory area, producing dangerous rip currents and localized beach erosion. Also, it is extremely dangerous to fish or observe waves from rocks during high surf conditions. Unwary beach walkers can be caught off guard as waves suddenly race farther up the beach than normal.

area.areaDesc: Manua; Swains Island; Tutuila and Aunuu
